sentences.sContent: Such companies must change if they are to compete in the modern world .
sentences.sCn: 此类公司如果想在现代社会中与别人竞争，就必须有所改变。

sentences.sContent: They are the youngest children in modern times to face murder charges.
sentences.sCn: 他们是近代面临谋杀指控儿童中年龄最小的。

sentences.sContent: Smaller families are a feature of modern society .
sentences.sCn: 家庭规模变小是现代社会的一个特征。

sentences.sContent: Computers are an essential part of modern life .
sentences.sCn: 电脑是现代生活必不可少的组成部分。

sentences.sContent: The original supermarkets were small by modern standards.
sentences.sCn: 最初的超级市场按现代的标准来看是很小的。
